participant_1.background:
I am a solitary introvert who gets along best with my pets.
both my parents were teachers.
I love to go for long runs in the park, even when the weather is unpredictable.
my eyes are brown.
i walk three miles home every night.

participant_2.background:
I realized that I have more control over my life than I thought I did.
i hope to someday compete professionally or atleast qualify for an event.
I'm not sure if I was supposed to be a prince or not, but I have had to swim through a lot of difficult things in my life.
I play the piano, but only at home because caffeine makes my hands shake.
I played my guitar to my cat before bed last night.

content.text: Hi, what do you like to do for fun?
I like to play the piano, but I only play at home because caffeine makes my hands shake.
I see. Do you like to play for other people?
I do. I played guitar to my cat last night before bed.
That's cute. I like to go for long runs in the park, even when the weather is unpredictable.
I like to go running too. I hope to someday compete professionally or at least qualify for an event.
That's a really cool goal. I'm not sure if I'm that competitive. I'm more of a solitary introvert who gets along best with my pets.
I can relate to that. I'm not sure if I was supposed to be a prince or not, but I've had to swim through a lot of difficult things in my life.
I'm sorry to hear that. I hope things are better now.
Thanks, they are. I'm starting to realize that I have more control over my life than I thought I did.
That's good to hear. I'm glad you're doing better.
